subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|alt2=刂|鼎|刀|ls=ic|t1=[[ding]], a bronze cauldron for cooking or sacrificial rituals|t2=knife}}. 鼎 was simplified as 貝 in the Small seal script.
